swf.name: Cutting
swf.short: Simple decomposition and line cutting demonstraint

long.text: The cutting algorithm accepts any simple (non-self-intersecting) polygon, and cuts it based on the line segment given.
Here we have such a complex polygon, and so we also perform a simple decomposition first (Please note: as of writing the simple decompositino algorithm is not 100% robust).

The handles on the polygon vertices may be dragged, as can the line segment end points noting that given the arguments to the cut algorithm, the line is strictly treat as a segment, and not an infinite line in the cut!
